title: Fancierstudio DSLR RIG With Follow Focus Matte Box And Counterweight By New Model Fancierstudio FL02M
description:
New Added Feature Shoulder Pad With Counterweight.  Here is the complete system for the DSLR or video camera owner, consisting of:  Shoulder Mount, Follow Focus and Matte Box.  The aim of this kit is to provide the operator maximum flexibility while shooting both outdoors and indoors. It is a very portable and handy kit.  

The Shoulder Mount makes it possible to deliver excellent results without any jerk or motion problems. The shoulder mount also eliminates the fatigue brought about by trying to balance your video camera or DSLR. The configuration of the Shoulder Mount is very quick and easy and requires no tools. This is one of the best kits at this price point available on the market today.
